New-York Historical Society
Billie Jean King autographed ticket to Grass Courts Championships and related documents
King, Billie Jean
AHMC - King, Billie Jean
4 item(s) in one folder
1972 4 items related to the Virginia Slims Grass Courts [Tennis] Championships held August 21-27, 1972, at the Newport Casino, Rhode Island, to benefit the National Lawn Tennis Hall of Fame. Items are: two tickets to the August 22 matches, one of which is autographed by Billie Jean King, attached to a backing board with King's photograph; the event program; and the schedule of matches for August 22.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: Billie Jean King autographed ticket to Grass Courts Championships and related documents.
